alert.note: Alert for Claiborne; Grainger; Hamblen; Hancock; Hawkins (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 06 at 1:29PM CDT until May 06 at 2:15PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Claiborne County in east Tennessee... West central Hawkins County in east Tennessee... Hancock County in east Tennessee... Northeastern Grainger County in east Tennessee... Northwestern Hamblen County in east Tennessee... * Until 315 PM EDT. * At 229 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bean Station, or 10 miles northeast of Rutledge, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Morristown, Rogersville, Sneedville, Rutledge, Bean Station, Howard Quarter, Thorn Hill, Mooresburg, Evanston and Panther Creek State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for east Tennessee...and southwestern Virginia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for east Tennessee...and southwestern Virginia.
